definition: the increase in volume of certain substances when they are heated, often accompanied by release of water
details:
noun
- the increase in volume of certain substances when they are heated, often accompanied by release of water
= example: the increase in volume of certain substances when they are heated, often accompanied by release of water
= synonyms: intumescence
- swelling up with blood or other fluids (as with congestion)
= synonyms: intumescence
